content.prompt: If f has exactly two critical points on the open interval (10, 14), which of the following must be true?

choices.label: f(x) > 0 for all x in the open interval (10, 14).
f'(x) exists for all x in the open interval (10, 14 ).
f'(x) < 0 for all x in the open interval (10, 11).

topic.text: 5.2: Extreme Value Theorem, Global Versus Local Extrema, and Critical Points

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
